roleset.name: board on sand, like snowboarding but on a sand dune
roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison with skateboard.01 and ski.01 but without a destination role. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.

example.name: both args
example.text: Yara, will you-1 go PRO-1 sandboarding at Sand Dunes National Park?
